name: Zazzle Media
description:
Zazzle Media is an award-winning digital marketing agency that takes a data-informed and content led approach. In simple terms, we connect our clients with targeted audiences of value via search, social and influencer channels.
Working from our Peterborough offices we provide measurable digital marketing solutions that really do work. With case studies from both large corporate clients and regional SMEs, we are set up and resourced to provide a personal yet professional service.
With companies including eBay, AO.com, Mulberry and Johnston Press we let our results speak for themselves.
Our team works closely with world authorities in the digital marketing space including Moz, Hubspot, Search Engine Watch and the Content Marketing Institute. We also speak regularly across the UK and US, delivering advice to the industry's up and coming stars.
READ MORE...
